publ: by Grupo Evans SA de CV
name: EVANSSMART
0:
”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”
”Alexa, turn off air conditioner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your EVANS SMART products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “EVANS SMART” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “EVANS SMART” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “EVANS SMART” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the <device name>.
Alexa, turn off the <device name>.
Alexa, set <device name> to 25 degrees.
Alexa, set the <device name> to auto mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to heat mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to cool mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to turbo mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to swing vertical mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to windless mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to health mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to swing horizontal mode.
Alexa, turn off <device name> turbo mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to stop health mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to stop swing vertical mode.
Alexa, set the <device name> to stop swing horizontal mode.
